entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Castlegar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:46 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Castlegar Airport 07:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Amount 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
